fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: Mainly regulatory processes concernig energy, chemistry, REACH, climate change, transport, innovations, bioeconomy and biofuels, renewable energies, environmental policy, forest policy, circular economy, waste and recycling policies, innovation policy, trade policy
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
position: Corporate Director for Strategy and Sustainable Development
goals__remit: ENERGOCHEMICA TRADING a.s. is a subsidiary of ENERGOCHEMICA SE. The holding’s core comprises chemical factories with a long tradition and heavy emphasis on product quality, environmental protection and occupational safety.  The holding consists of several production and sales companies and an R&D institute. Energy production forms an inseparable part of the chemical production, making its chemical processes fully energy self-sufficient and also providing energy to external users.
